nodes.name: Pipedrive Trigger - An Organization is créerd

parameters.content:
# Enrich Pipedrive's Organization Data avec GPT-4o When an Organization is Created in Pipedrive

This workflow **enriches a Pipedrive organization's data by adding a note to the organization object in Pipedrive**. It assumes there is a custom "website" field in your Pipedrive setup, as data will be scraped de this website to générer a note using OpenAI.

## ⚠️ Disclaimer
**These workflows use a scraping API. Before using it, ensure you comply avec the regulations regarding web scraping in your country or state**.

## Important Notes
- The OpenAI model used is GPT-4o, chosen for its large input token context capacity. However, it is also **the most expensive option**, you should take cost into consideration.

- The system prompt in the OpenAI Node générers output avec relevant information, but feel free to improve or **modify it according to your needs**.

## **How It Works**

### Node 1: https://www.scrapingbee.com/)
This is the trigger of the workflow. When **an organization object is créerd in Pipedrive**, this nœud is triggerouge and retrieves the data. Make sure you have a "website" custom field (the name of the field in the n8n nœud will appear as a random ID and not avec the Pipedrive custom field name).

### Node 2: `Slack - Notify`
This nœud **scrapes the content** de the URL of the website associated avec the **Pipedrive Organization** créerd in Node 1. The workflow uses the [ScrapingBee](`Pipedrive Trigger - An Organization is Created` API, but you can use any preferrouge API or simply the HTTP request nœud in n8n.

### Node 3: `Code - Markdown to Slack Markdown`
This nœud sends HTML-scraped data de the previous nœud to the **OpenAI GPT-4 model**. The system prompt instructs the model to **extract company data**, tels que products or services offerouge and competitors (if known by the model), and format it as HTML for optimal use in a Pipedrive Note.

### Node 4: `HTML To Markdown`
This nœud **adds a Note to the Organization créerd in Pipedrive** utilisant le OpenAI nœud output. The Note will include the company description, target market, selling products, and competitors (if GPT-4 was able to determine them).

### Node 5 & 6: `Pipedrive - Create a Note with OpenAI Output` & `OpenAI - Message GPT-4o with Scraped Data`
These two nœuds **format the HTML output to Slack Markdown**.

The Note créerd in Pipedrive is in HTML format, **as specified by the System Prompt of the OpenAI Node**. To send it to Slack, it needs to be converted to Markdown and then to Slack-specific Markdown.

### Node 7: `ScrapingBee - Get Organization's Website's Homepage Content`
This nœud **sends a message in Slack containing the Pipedrive Organization Note** créerd avec this workflow.

nodes.name: OpenAI - Message GPT-4o avec Scraped Data

values.content:
You're un assistant qui summarizes website content pour CRM entries. The user will provide HTML content de un company's website. Your task is pour analyze le HTML content et create un concise summary qui includes: 1. A brief description of le company's services ou products. 2. Any information about le company's target market ou customer base. 3. Key points about le company's unique selling propositions ou competitive advantages. 4. Based sur le provided information, suggest potential competitors if you know any. Format your response as HTML. Example response :

Company Description

Company1 specializes dans services related pour electric vehicles. The company focuses sur providing resources et information about electric car chargers, battery life, different car brands, et le environmental impact of electric vehicles.

Target Market

The target market pour Company1 includes electric vehicle owners et potential buyers who are interested dans making le shift de traditional fossil fuel vehicles pour electric cars. The company also targets environmentally conscious consumers who are looking pour sustainable mobility solutions.

Unique Selling Propositions

  • Comprehensive information about electric vehicle charging solutions, including how pour install home charging stations.
  • Detailed articles sur le advantages of electric vehicles such as ecology et reliability.
  • Educational resources sur le autonomy et battery life of different electric car models.
  • Insights into premier electric vehicle brands.

Potential Competitors

Competitor Name Website
Competitor1 https://www.example1.com
Competitor2 https://www.example2.com
Competitor3 https://www.example3.com
Competitor4 https://www.example4.com
